customSolution.name: Azure Backup Monitoring Solution
customSolution.description: Monitor and analyze your Backup Vaults
customSolution.author: Microsoft

Header.Title: Alerts by Alert Type
Header.Subtitle: Filter by Datasource Type by Clicking the (+) above

Donut.Query: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join ((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "")) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | where ${DatasourceType} | summarize count() by AlertType_s | sort by count_ desc

List.Query: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join ((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" )) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | where ${DatasourceType} | summarize count() by AlertType_s | sort by count_ desc
List.NavigationQuery: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join ((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" ) ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | where ${DatasourceType} | summarize count() by AlertType_s | sort by count_ desc | search {selected item}

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join ((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" ) ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | where ${DatasourceType} | summarize count() by AlertType_s | sort by count_ desc | search {selected item}

Trend1.ChartQuery: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join ((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_s )) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | where ${DatasourceType} | summarize count(AlertUniqueId) by bin(TimeGenerated,1h)

Trend2.ChartQuery: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join ((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_s )) on BackupItemUniqueId_s| where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | where ${DatasourceType} |summarize count(AlertUniqueId) by bin(TimeGenerated,1h)

List.Query: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; let FullTable = (AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | extend AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ); BackupIdTypeMap | join(FullTable | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId | where AlertUniqueId != "" | extend CurrentStatus = AlertStatus_s | join (FullTable | summarize HitCount = count() by AlertUniqueId ) on AlertUniqueId) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | where ${DatasourceType} | project AlertUniqueId , AlertStatus_s, AlertCode_s, HitCount | sort by AlertStatus_s asc, HitCount desc
List.NavigationQuery: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; let FullTable = (AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | extend AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ); BackupIdTypeMap | join(FullTable | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId | where AlertUniqueId != "" | extend CurrentStatus = AlertStatus_s | join (FullTable | summarize HitCount = count() by AlertUniqueId ) on AlertUniqueId) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | where ${DatasourceType} | project AlertUniqueId , AlertStatus_s, AlertCode_s, HitCount | sort by AlertStatus_s asc, HitCount desc | search {selected item}

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; let FullTable = (AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | extend AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ); BackupIdTypeMap | join(FullTable | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId | where AlertUniqueId != "" | extend CurrentStatus = AlertStatus_s | join (FullTable | summarize HitCount = count() by AlertUniqueId ) on AlertUniqueId) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | where ${DatasourceType} | project AlertUniqueId , AlertStatus_s, AlertCode_s, HitCount | sort by AlertStatus_s asc, HitCount desc | search {selected item}

Header.Title: Active Alerts by Severity
Header.Subtitle: Filter by Datasource Type by clicking the (+) above

Donut.Query: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | where AlertStatus_s=="Active" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s| where ${DatasourceType} | summarize count() by AlertSeverity_s | sort by count_ desc

List.Query: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join ((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | where AlertStatus_s=="Active" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g )) on BackupItemUniqueId_s| where ${DatasourceType} |summarize count() by AlertSeverity_s | sort by count_ desc
List.NavigationQuery: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join ((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | where AlertStatus_s=="Active" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g )) on BackupItemUniqueId_s| where ${DatasourceType} |summarize count() by AlertSeverity_s | sort by count_ desc | search {selected item}

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join ((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | where AlertStatus_s=="Active" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g )) on BackupItemUniqueId_s| where ${DatasourceType} |summarize count() by AlertSeverity_s | sort by count_ desc | search {selected item}

Header.Title: Resolved Alerts by Severity
Header.Subtitle: Filter by Datasource Type by clicking the (+) above

Donut.Query: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) ) on BackupItemUniqueId_s| where ${DatasourceType} | summarize count() by AlertSeverity_s | sort by count_ desc

List.Query: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join ((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g )) on BackupItemUniqueId_s| where ${DatasourceType} |summarize count() by AlertSeverity_s | sort by count_ desc
List.NavigationQuery: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join ((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g )) on BackupItemUniqueId_s| where ${DatasourceType} |summarize count() by AlertSeverity_s | sort by count_ desc | search {selected item}

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; BackupIdTypeMap | join ((AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g )) on BackupItemUniqueId_s| where ${DatasourceType} |summarize count() by AlertSeverity_s | sort by count_ desc | search {selected item}

General.title: Avg Alert Resolution Time per week (hrs)

Header.Title: Avg Alert Resolution Time per week (hrs)
Header.Subtitle: Stretch the time axis to see the trend (above time filter)

LineChart.Query: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | where ${DatasourceType} | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; let AlertStarts= (AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | extend startTime=TimeGenerated; let AlertEnds= (AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | extend endTime=TimeGenerated; let Table1 = AlertStarts | join (AlertEnds) on AlertUniqueId | extend timeToResolveInHrs=datetime_diff("hour",endTime,startTime); Table1 | join kind=inner(BackupIdTypeMap) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize avg(timeToResolveInHrs) by bin(TimeGenerated,7d)

List.Query: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | where ${DatasourceType} | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; let AlertStarts=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | extend startTime=TimeGenerated; let AlertEnds=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) |where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | extend endTime=TimeGenerated; let Table1 = AlertStarts | join (AlertEnds) on AlertUniqueId | extend timeToResolveInHrs=datetime_diff("hour",endTime,startTime); Table1 | join kind=inner(BackupIdTypeMap) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize avgResolutionTime=avg(timeToResolveInHrs) by weekStart=bin(TimeGenerated,7d) | sort by weekStart desc
List.NavigationQuery: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | where ${DatasourceType} | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; let AlertStarts=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | extend startTime=TimeGenerated; let AlertEnds=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) |where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | extend endTime=TimeGenerated; let Table1 = AlertStarts | join (AlertEnds) on AlertUniqueId | extend timeToResolveInHrs=datetime_diff("hour",endTime,startTime); Table1 | join kind=inner(BackupIdTypeMap) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize avgResolutionTime=avg(timeToResolveInHrs) by weekStart=bin(TimeGenerated,7d)

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: let BackupIdTypeMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemType_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | where ${DatasourceType} | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; let AlertStarts=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | extend startTime=TimeGenerated; let AlertEnds=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) |where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | extend endTime=TimeGenerated; let Table1 = AlertStarts | join (AlertEnds) on AlertUniqueId | extend timeToResolveInHrs=datetime_diff("hour",endTime,startTime); Table1 | join kind=inner(BackupIdTypeMap) on BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize avgResolutionTime=avg(timeToResolveInHrs) by weekStart=bin(TimeGenerated,7d)

General.title: Top 3 backup Items by Avg Alert Resolution time

Header.Title: Breakup by Avg Alert Resolution time (hrs)
Header.Subtitle: Filter by Datasource Type by clicking the (+) above

Donut.Query: let BackupIdNameMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where BackupItemFriendlyName_s != "" | where ${DatasourceType} | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemFriendlyName_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; let AlertStarts=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | extend startTime=TimeGenerated; let AlertEnds=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | extend endTime=TimeGenerated; let Table1 = AlertStarts | join (AlertEnds) on AlertUniqueId | extend timeToResolveInHrs=datetime_diff("hour",endTime,startTime); let Table2 = Table1 | join kind=inner(BackupIdNameMap) on BackupItemUniqueId_s; Table2 | summarize avg(timeToResolveInHrs) by BackupItemUniqueId_s | sort by avg_timeToResolveInHrs desc

List.Query: let BackupIdNameMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where BackupItemFriendlyName_s != "" | where ${DatasourceType} | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemFriendlyName_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; let AlertStarts=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | extend startTime=TimeGenerated; let AlertEnds=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | extend endTime=TimeGenerated; let Table1 = AlertStarts | join (AlertEnds) on AlertUniqueId | extend timeToResolveInHrs=datetime_diff("hour",endTime,startTime); let Table2 = Table1 | join kind=inner(BackupIdNameMap) on BackupItemUniqueId_s; Table2 | summarize avg(timeToResolveInHrs) by BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s | sort by avg_timeToResolveInHrs desc
List.NavigationQuery: let BackupIdNameMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where BackupItemFriendlyName_s != "" | where ${DatasourceType} | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemFriendlyName_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; let AlertStarts=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | extend startTime=TimeGenerated; let AlertEnds=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | extend endTime=TimeGenerated; let Table1 = AlertStarts | join (AlertEnds) on AlertUniqueId | extend timeToResolveInHrs=datetime_diff("hour",endTime,startTime); let Table2 = Table1 | join kind=inner(BackupIdNameMap) on BackupItemUniqueId_s; Table2 | summarize avg(timeToResolveInHrs) by BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s | sort by avg_timeToResolveInHrs desc | search {selected item}

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: let BackupIdNameMap = AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where BackupItemFriendlyName_s != "" | where ${DatasourceType} | project TimeGenerated, BackupItemFriendlyName_s , BackupItemUniqueId_s | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by BackupItemUniqueId_s; let AlertStarts=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | extend startTime=TimeGenerated; let AlertEnds=(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "Alert" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertUniqueId_g != "" | extend ResourceLocation="Azure", AlertUniqueId=AlertUniqueId_g ) | where AlertStatus_s=="Resolved" | extend endTime=TimeGenerated; let Table1 = AlertStarts | join (AlertEnds) on AlertUniqueId | extend timeToResolveInHrs=datetime_diff("hour",endTime,startTime); let Table2 = Table1 | join kind=inner(BackupIdNameMap) on BackupItemUniqueId_s; Table2 | summarize avg(timeToResolveInHrs) by BackupItemUniqueId_s, BackupItemFriendlyName_s | sort by avg_timeToResolveInHrs desc | search {selected item}

Filters.QueryForValues: AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport" | where OperationName == "BackupItem" | where BackupItemType_s != "" | distinct BackupItemType_s
Filters.Title: DatasourceType

TileOne.Query: AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport"| where OperationName == "Alert" | where AlertUniqueId_g!=""| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | count

TileTwo.Query: AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureBackupReport"| where OperationName == "Alert" | where AlertUniqueId_g!=""| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AlertUniqueId_g | where AlertStatus_s == "Active" | count
